device.name: ieee_802_15_4_probe
device.documentation: The <class>ieee_802_15_4_probe</class> provides a way to listen to traffic at a particular device that is connected to the link. The probe will receive both incoming and outgoing traffic for the device.
device.limitations:
• At most one snooper function can be active. Attaching a new snooper function would detach the old one, if there is any.
  • Snooper function and user data are not checkpointed.
